verses.text: \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes awarded \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w estate|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* entered \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* Esther \w had|strong="H4428"\w* revealed \w his|strong="H5414"\w* relation \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w signet|strong="H2885"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* recovered \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w presented|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* Esther \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w estate|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w once|strong="H3254"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*, Esther addressed \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w She|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w begged|strong="H2603"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* revoke \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w scheme|strong="H4284"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Agagite, \w which|strong="H3064"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w extended|strong="H3447"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w scepter|strong="H8275"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* Esther, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

“\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w pleases|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,” \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w seems|strong="H3605"\w* \w proper|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w pleasing|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w an|strong="H4672"\w* \w order|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w revoke|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* scheming \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hammedatha|strong="H4099"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Agagite, \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* bear \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w befall|strong="H4672"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* bear \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w kindred|strong="H4138"\w*?” The Decree of Xerxes

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes said \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Esther \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*’s \w estate|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Esther, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w attacked|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w please|strong="H2896"\w* \w regarding|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w seal|strong="H2856"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w signet|strong="H2885"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H3791"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w signet|strong="H2885"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w* cannot \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w revoked|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w At|strong="H2320"\w* once \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w scribes|strong="H5608"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w on|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w twenty-third|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* (\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sivan|strong="H5510"\w* \f + \fr 8:9 \ft Sivan is the third month of the Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of May and June.\f*), \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*’s \w orders|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* satraps, \w governors|strong="H6346"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* 127 \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w India|strong="H1912"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w* \f + \fr 8:9 \ft That is, to the upper Nile region\f*—\w writing|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* script, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w language|strong="H3956"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* script \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w language|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w Mordecai|strong="H3789"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w it|strong="H8034"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w signet|strong="H2885"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*. \w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w documents|strong="H5612"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w mounted|strong="H7392"\w* \w couriers|strong="H7323"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H7392"\w* \w swift|strong="H7409"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* bred \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* mares.

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* letters \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w permitted|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* right \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w assemble|strong="H6950"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w defend|strong="H5975"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w*, \w kill|strong="H2026"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* annihilate \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forces|strong="H6696"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w or|strong="H5892"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w* hostile \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w including|strong="H3605"\w* women \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w plunder|strong="H7998"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w possessions|strong="H7998"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* single \w day|strong="H3117"\w* appointed \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Adar.\f + \fr 8:12 \ft Adar is the twelfth month of the Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of February and March.\f*

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w copy|strong="H6572"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w text|strong="H3791"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w edict|strong="H1881"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w issued|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w published|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* ready \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* enemies.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w couriers|strong="H7323"\w* \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* haste \w on|strong="H7392"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w horses|strong="H7409"\w*, pressed \w on|strong="H7392"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w edict|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w issued|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w citadel|strong="H1002"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Susa|strong="H7800"\w*.

\w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w garments|strong="H3830"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w white|strong="H2353"\w*, \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w purple|strong="H8504"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* fine linen. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Susa|strong="H7800"\w* \w shouted|strong="H6670"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H8057"\w* light \w and|strong="H8057"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, \w of|strong="H8057"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H8057"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w edict|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w decree|strong="H1881"\w* \w reached|strong="H5060"\w*, \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w feasting|strong="H4960"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* celebrating. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2896"\w* \w became|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.
